text: Awukaboni yini ukuhlangana kwabantwana bakwa-Israel emumva kukaMose ngesikhathi bethi kumphrofethi wabo “thumela kuthina iNkosi ukuze silwe endleleni kaMvelinqangi” wathi, “Akusikhona yini ukuthi naniyobaleka ukuba naninqunyelwe ukulwa? Bathi, “kwakungoba yini ukuthi singangalwi futhi kwakungoba yini ukuthi singangalwi endleleni kaMvelinqangi na? Sibe sasikade sasikhishwe emakhaya ethu nasezinganeni zethu na?” kwathi lapho sebenqunyelwe ukulwa bajikela emuva ngaphandle kwabayingcosana kubona futhi uMvelinqangi ungobaziyo abenzi bobubi
